name: Norris' Sesame Pasta Salad
author: WholesomeHunter
summary: Do not question whether or not to try this recipe. It is a nice pasta salad for any occasion that, once tasted, one cannot resist having some more.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons red pepper flakes, or to taste
¾ cup chopped fresh cilantro, or more to taste
¾ cup shaved green onions, or more to taste
⅓ cup honey-roasted peanuts, or more to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 12 minutes; drain
Mix spaghetti, sesame oil, honey, soy sauce, corn oil, red pepper flakes, and salt together in a large bowl until spaghetti is evenly coated
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 4 hours
Add cilantro, green onions, peanuts, and sesame seeds; toss to combine
